item.title: Hugo and RobotsTxt
item.description: How Hugo support RobotsTxt Config config.toml enableRobotsTXT = true [params].env = "production" run hugo command to generate the web site a robots.txt will be generated in public directory robots.txt templates are existing in layouts/robots.txt file, or themes/ananke/layouts/robots.txt file the templates would affects the content of the generated public/robots.txt RobotsTxt samples Which tells search engines that they are allowed to crawl everything:
